data.title: Where Is Valdosta State University?
data.meta_description: Learn more about the location of Valdosta State University using this detailed map. See where VSU is and what the surrounding neighborhood is like.
data.text:
Check out the location and the area surrounding Valdosta State University so you can see exactly where the school is. How far away is the campus from where you currently live? You want to also make sure you will like the around the campus, too.

Why Location Matters

While you are studying at the school, chances are you'll want to go off-campus sometimes, too. You should know if the area arround VSU is in a safe neighborhood and how close it is to other cities in the general area.

Valdosta State University Location and Map

Located in Valdosta, Georgia, Valdosta State University is a public institution. The location of the school is great for students who enjoy the amenities of city life.

Location of Valdosta State University

Contact details for VSU are given below.
